name: Veteran Owned Business Grant
description: Support for veteran-owned small businesses meeting specific ownership, size, income, and location criteria
ui_questions: Are you a veteran or a military spouse with at least 51% ownership of the business?
Does your business have between 3 and 20 employees?
Is your annual revenue less than or equal to $5 million?
Is your business located in an economically vulnerable area?
human_summary: Support for veteran-owned small businesses with up to 20 employees and $5M revenue.
risk_notes: Excludes non-profits, illegal businesses, and certain franchises.
